Class AttributeSummarizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • weka.gui.beans.DataVisualizer
              • weka.gui.beans.AttributeSummarizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.beancontext.BeanContextChild, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, EnvironmentHandler, BeanCommon, DataSourceListener, EventConstraints, HeadlessEventCollector, KnowledgeFlowApp.KFPerspective, TestSetListener, TrainingSetListener, UserRequestAcceptor, Visible

    public class AttributeSummarizer
extends DataVisualizer
implements KnowledgeFlowApp.KFPerspective
    Bean that encapsulates displays bar graph summaries for attributes in a data set.
    Version:
    $Revision: 10216 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
